infos.value: You look to be safe and sound, princesses.
With this, those Rundall soldiers will surely refrain from pestering you anymore.
And you've just come to that realization now?
Wezette... The rumored land of extreme cold. What a trek.
Won't you tag along? You would be more than welcome.
Absolutely not. We won't be taking even a single step toward Wezette.
So hurry along and be on your way, please.
I'll be sure to pay you a visit someday.
Until then, your smiling face will remain engraved in my mind, princess.
Hey, hey! What are we gonna do now?
That is the question, now isn't it?
Which way do you want to go, Chel?
Well, as long as we aren't moving any closer to Wezette, I suppose...
Well then, let's be on our way.
How much time must pass before we're finally allowed to return home?
I rush over after a report of an attack on Lykeros Castle, and this is what I find...
Whose military could have done this? Sadali, maybe? Or perhaps...
It was three wanderers, two brothers and their little sister...
A measly three opponents made such a mess of you all...?
That's really something else! They sound incredible!
Ahhh, I wish I could have been here to greet them.
Well, if that's the case, then this was inevitable.
B-but Lord Jayden...at this rate, obstacles to our top-secret invasion of Ovis will surely arise...
The world is a vast place, after all.
Indeed... This is just too much fun.
